name: GrindingCoffe
description: Grinding Coffee is an ecommerce, it uses JavaScript as main tool, along with Express, Node.js, JSON, EJS, and CSS. The project is continuously updated, with a final version expected soon. The login and registration processes are operational, as well as CRUD implementation.

name: MercadoLiebre
description: This project serves as a practice exercise, modeled after the Mercado Libre website, allowing me to test my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Backend), Express, and Node.js.

name: Expresify
description: This is a future project that I'm working on with a friend, aiming to utilize all the tools we've learned. We're hopeful that it will become a reality soon. The project is being built with EJS, CSS, Express, Node.js, and JavaScript for both backend and frontend development.
